summary:
Large house with yard between Treva\'s Watch, Sarethi Farm and Heartwood Mill
Several companions can circulate around and inside the home.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=200][color=#C03000][b][i][u]\"Stonewall Manor\"[/u][/i][/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][youtube]9d-at25FtEw[/youtube][/center]
[center]Video by Ragondinator[/center]

Other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29472]Stonewall Gaden V3[/url]


Description
===========
Large house with yard.between Treva\'s Watch, Sarethi Farm and Heartwood Mill
Several companions can circulate around and inside the home.

Outdoor: 
4 Merchants (apothecary, bar, blacksmith, miscellaneous)
Garden and stable.(cows, chickens)
Guards

Indoors.
Hall, Mannequins, display case, daggers,weapons and shields plaques, library, bedrooms, kitchen/bar, crafting, chests, all shrines, 
Storage priest masks, etc ...

Install
=======
Download with NMM
or
Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
Copy the .BSA file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\

Uninstall
=========
with NMM
or
Delete the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
Delete the .BSA file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\

=========
Update V1.1
- Added 4 guards to defend the house. 
- Problem of texture between the body and the face of the NPC\'s resolved. 
- Changing the guards armor. Now she corresponds to Riften 

Contact
=======
sandysan

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Blary, Oaristys, Tony67 and yourenotsupposedtobeinhere for their resources mods. 

Vidéo and some screamshots use some mods as follows:
_Sexy Villages and Towns by horrorview
_Sexy Riften v2 by horrorview
_Sexy Whiterun v3 by horrorview
_Radiant and Unique Potions and Poisons HD by XRC
_Extensible Follower Framework FRENCH by expired6978

Thanks to Ragondinator for the video.
author: sandysan
